common.description:
The SpiritSwap protocol captures the essence of everything Defi 2.0 on the Fantom network, delivering a complete hub for trading, lending and borrowing, reward sharing, staking delegations, and farming.

Scroll below and click on “Learn more” to learn more about SpiritSwap’s unique features and lucrative investment options.
common.descriptionFull:
The SpiritSwap protocol captures the essence of everything Defi 2.0 on the Fantom network, delivering a complete hub for trading, lending and borrowing, reward sharing, staking delegations, and farming.

Scroll below and click on “Learn more” to learn more about SpiritSwap’s unique features and lucrative investment options.

swap.title: Swap your favourite tokens
swap.description: SpiritSwap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) on the Fantom Opera Chain.</br></br>Our current AMM architecture is proprietary, combining our upgraded uniV2 AMM with our brand new stable swap. This combination delivers the unique ability to achieve lightning quick swaps at the best rates the market has to offer.

farms.title: Earn passively by farming
farms.description: Farming is the process of lending your assets to our AMM. These assets are used to build liquidity pools, allowing people to swap and trade.</br></br>In return for providing liquidity to SpiritSwap, you are rewarded with SPIRIT tokens. These can be used to invest, vote, boost farm rewards, and more.

bridge.title: Bridge your tokens
bridge.description: Our bridge aggregator is a first of its kind on Fantom. You can now bridge tokens over from other chains such as Ethereum, Avalanche, Terra and Arbitrum to name a few.</br></br>By using our SpiritBridge, you have the ability to port over assets and capital from other chains to enjoy the speed and efficiency that SpiritSwap offers on the Fantom Opera network.

inspirit.title: Benefit from inSPIRIT
inspirit.description: When locking up SPIRIT for inSPIRIT, participants are provided with three value propositions.</br></br>1. inSPIRIT allows you to boost your farming emissions</br></br>2. Receive a share of revenue from DEX swaps</br></br>3. Participate in governance via voting on farm emissions and community proposals via our DAO forum
inspirit.inSpiritReward: Your reward will be claimable in

leverage.title: Leverage your trades
leverage.description: Coming soon: Ape Mode is a leverage trading feature, unique to SpiritSwap and a first of its kind on Fantom’s DeFi ecosystem. Ape Mode provides users with a simplified, one-click leverage trade opportunity, offering up to 3x leverage on assets such as FTM, SPIRIT, TAROT, LQDR and ICE.

lend.title: Lend and borrow
lend.description:
Ola’s lending network hosted by SpiritSwap allows for lending and borrowing directly within our DEX. This means people can leverage their trades, leverage their farms, or provide lending assets directly to the network.

Through the implementation of our new stable AMM, the lending network is supplied directly from dormant liquidity in our stable LPs. This ensures a constant supply of assets is available to borrow and be used for lending incentives, which dramatically improves capital efficiency.

tokensPanel.title: Tokens
tokensPanel.helper: Tokens displayed are single asset tokens held in your wallet that aren't currently in yield positions. This is considered dormant capital.

message.ALL: You currently don't own any tokens
message.VERIFIED: You currently don’t own verified tokens
message.UNVERIFIED: You currently don’t own unverified tokens

noFarms.message: You currently don't have active farms

sub.title: Liquidity
sub.helper1: LP tokens = LP positions that aren't currently in farms (you might want to add them to farms to get rewards)
sub.helper2: Farms = LP positions that are currently yielding rewards through farm emissions.

helper.title: Limit Orders
helper.text: Limit orders are powered by Gelato and allow users to place buy and sell orders above or below market rate. These will execute only once the strike price is met.

limitOrderPanel.NoOpenLimitOrderText: You currently don't have open limit orders

helper.title: Lend & Borrow
helper.text: Lend and borrow directly from the network. This allows you to leverage your trades, leverage your farms, or provide lending assets directly to the network. Through the implementation of our new stable AMM, the lending network is supplied directly from dormant liquidity in our stable LPs. This ensures a constant supply of assets is available to borrow and be used for lending incentives, which dramatically improves capital efficiency.

lendAndBorrowPanel.NoLendAndBorrowText: You currently don't lend or borrow tokens

migrate.confirmAllTransactions: Confirm all transactions to finish the migration.
migrate.description: SpiritSwap v2 uses new contracts for LP tokens. Finish this process to migrate your v1 LP tokens over to v2.

swap.priceImpactExpaination: The difference between the market price and estimated price depending on the trade size.

settings.title: Settings
settings.slippageExplanation: You can set the maximum % of price movement you can live with.
settings.approveMaxExplaination: Approval transactions will be set to infinite. This will allow you to skip approvals steps in the future
settings.transactionDeadlineExplanation: The amount of time you are happy to the transaction to pend before failing
settings.chartExplanation: Here you can turn on/off the chart.
settings.tradeModeExplanation: Here you can select your trade mode
settings.helperTitle: Swap settings allow you to adjust the parameters of your swap.
settings.helperP1: Slippage = You can set the maximum % of price movement you can live with
settings.helperP2: Transaction Speed = The price of gas you are willing to pay. Higher price means quicker transaction times.
settings.helperP3: Transaction deadline = The amount of time you are happy to the transaction to pend before failing.
settings.helperP4: Approve Max = Approval transactions will be set to infinite. This will allow you to skip approvals steps in the future
settings.warningMessage: Caution, your slippage is high. Your trade may be front run.

questionHelper.routeExplanation: The route is the liquidity pools that the trade must run through in order to execute.
questionHelper.swapExplanation: This is where you can swap your tokens.
questionHelper.limitBuyExplanation: A buy limit order can only be executed at the limit price or lower.
questionHelper.twapExplanation: With Time Weighted Average Price (TWAP) orders, you can break up a larger order into smaller trades that execute automatically at regular intervals over time.
questionHelper.limitSellExplanation: A sell limit order can only be executed at the limit price or higher.
questionHelper.liquidityProviderFeeExplanation: The fee the liquidity providers of this pool will receive for this trade.
questionHelper.gelatoProviderFeeExplanation: The fee that goes to Gelato for providing limit order service.

helperModal.positionsExplanation: Positions show which positions you currently have open. You can close a position for realized gains or losses by clicking the “close” button.

helperModal.addLiquidity: Add liquidity is where you can supply liquidity to our DEX for rewards.
helperModal.yourLiquidity: Your liquidity shows what your liquidity positions currently are. This is where you can keep track of all of your Liquidity Pool positions.

confirmPanel.alert: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than 0.1% your transaction will revert.

common.connectText: Connect you wallet to see your LP tokens
common.confirmCancelTransactionProcess: Are you sure you want to abort the current transaction process?
common.confirmAllTransactions: Confirm all transactions to add liquidity.
common.confirmAllTransactionsDelete: Confirm all transactions to remove liquidity.
common.firstLiquidityProvider: You are the first liquidity provider. No farms exist for this pair. The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool. Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
common.alternatePair: It looks like you are trying to add liquidity to a {{type}} liquidity pool which does not have a farm. A farm exists for the {{altType}} liquidity pool, if you would like to deposit into this farm, switch your liquidity type to {{altType}}.

helperModal.farmExplanation: Farms are where you provide your LP tokens to receive rewards for supplying liquidity to our DEX.

boostInfoPanel.boostfactorExplanation: Your boost factor indicates what kind of a boost you are receiving for this farm depending on how much inSPIRIT you hold. More inSPIRIT = More boost = More rewards.
boostInfoPanel.noBoostTokens: You have not deposited into this farm

iconTooltipPanel.aprRangeExplanation: The APR range indicates what your APR (Annual returns) will be based on the boost your farm is receiving.
iconTooltipPanel.aprExplanation: The APR indicates what your annual returns will be. This farm is not boosted and does not have an APR range.
iconTooltipPanel.votingWeightExplanation: Voting weight indicates what % of emissions this gauge is receiving this week in accordance with global emission votes.

ecosystem.disclaimer: Ecosystem farms are permissionless and anyone can create them. For your safety SpiritSwap recommends doing your own research before interacting with these protocols.<0/>They consist of two types: Whitelisted farms are marked with a<1/>and farms that are not whitelisted are maked with a <2/>.

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.liquidity: Create a liquidity pair for your planned ecosystem farm on SpiritSwap

tokensInLP.title: Tokens in LP
tokensInLP.legend: Add token addresses from which the liquidity pool token is based on.
tokensInLP.alertMessage: Your entered tokens require a liquidity pair on SpiritSwap. Please make sure that liquidity is provided.

emissionSettings.title: Emission settings
emissionSettings.legend: Set your emission token and amount, that stakers shall receive as farm reward. It needs to be locked for at least 1 month.

roiCalculator.legend: Calculated based on current rates. Compounding once daily. Rates are estimates provided for your convenience only, and by no means represent guaranteed returns.

modalHelper.votingExplanation: Voting allows you to vote on how many weekly emissions each gauge / farm will receive.
modalHelper.dashboardExplanation: Your dashboard indicates all of the key metrics surrounding your inSPIRIT position. Each week you receive rewards from protocol fees. You can claim these here every Wednesday at 4 pm PST. The countdown clock will indicate when you can claim your reward.
modalHelper.inspiritExplanation: inSPIRIT is our governance token. It offers various revenue streams and rewards for people who participate in our protocol. Please refer to our documents for more information on the benefits of inSPIRIT.
modalHelper.inpiritStatsExplanation: This dashboard gives you an overview of each week / month inSPIRIT statistics as per the parameters outlined in the dashboard. You can customize the data points by week or month for a greater analytical overview.

help.inspiritExplanation: inSPIRIT is the governance token of SpiritSwap that is based on a vote locking model.
help.votelockingExplanation: In order to receive inSPIRIT, you have to lock SPIRIT tokens for a time period you choose. You can’t unlock your SPIRIT tokens in this period.
help.lockSpiritQuestion: Why should I lock my SPIRIT?
help.lockspiritExplanation: By owning inSPIRIT you gain voting power for boosted farms, farm multipliers, receiving participation rewards and weekly distributions.
help.endPeriodQuestion: What happens at the end of a period?
help.endPeriodExplanation: If you don’t choose to extend your delegation, once the delegation period is over you can then unlock your SPIRIT. By design, your inSPIRIT balance will reduce over time. Think of this as a count down clock to your initial SPIRIT delegation being unlocked.

voting.title: Voting
voting.votesNotAdding: Votes need to add up to 100% but are adding up to
voting.subtitle: Vote with your received inSPIRIT
voting.generateButton: Generate inSPIRIT to vote for boosted farms
voting.voteSum100: Please make sure your votes sum to 100%
voting.inputGreaterThanBribeLeft: Please input an amount greater than ongoing bribe amount left

bribes.selectFarmToBribe: Select the farm you want to bribe

common.title: Bridge Tokens
common.description: Bridging is the process of bringing your assets cross chain. For example, if you have assets on BSC, you can bridge them to Fantom and participate in SpiritSwap rewards.

helperModal.apeModeExplanation: Ape mode is a product that allows for leveraged trades select your collateral, select your leverage and long certain assets.
helperModal.positionsExplanation: Positions show which positions you currently have open. You can close a position for realized gains or losses by clicking the “close” button.

wip.title: Ape Mode v2 is still in progress
wip.text:
The apes have gone wild. Please be patient as we herd them back to the zoo.
To think you could tame the apes…

spiritWars.description: With the Curve Wars fully in motion on the Ethereum blockchain, the fighting spirit has now spread to Fantom as well. The protocol that is central to this battle is SpiritSwap.

helper.title: Spirit Wars
helper.text: SpiritWars provides an overview of all data relating to winSPIRIT pairs, their dominance and current peg situation.

helper.title: Spirit Wars Statistics
helper.text: This pie chart will visualize the dominance of inSPIRIT ownership by each respective protocol.

helper.title: Circulating Spirit
helper.text: = Total minted - team fund - DAO fund - burnt tokens - locked SPIRIT.
